content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 16-23)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Functional Power Plant at (-9.5, 0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) facing right
- Boiler at (-7.0, 1.5) facing right (contains 2 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 1.5) facing right
- Connected with water pipes between pump and boiler
- Connected with steam pipes between boiler and engine
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 3.5) connecting to power network

### Smelting and Production Area
- Iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 0.0) (contains 14 iron ore, 37 coal)
- Copper smelting furnace at (5.0, 4.0) (contains 15 copper ore, 17 coal, 16 copper plates)
- Gear assembler at (8.5, 0.5) (waiting for iron plates)
- Cable assembler at (8.5, 4.5) (contains 12 copper cables, output full)
- Science assembler at (12.5, 2.5) (waiting for copper plates and gears)
- Power poles connecting the area to power network (multiple positions)

### Transport Infrastructure
- Iron plate inserter at (6.5, 0.5) facing right (connecting furnace to gear assembler)
- Copper plate inserter at (6.5, 4.5) facing right (output blocked)
- Gear output inserter at (10.5, 0.5) facing left (connecting gear assembler to science assembler)

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt connection errors
- Cannot connect belts directly to furnaces or assemblers - must use inserters as intermediaries
- When setting up transport, always place an inserter between machines and belts
- Verify inserter directions match the desired item flow path

### Production bottlenecks
- Gear assembler is idle due to missing iron plates - check furnace output and transport
- Science assembler is idle due to missing copper plates and gears - verify all input supply chains
- Copper cable assembler output is full - needs output transport system

### Inserter issues
- Copper plate inserter output is blocked - ensure destination has space or transport
- Verify all inserters have power and are properly oriented
- Check inserter pickup/drop positions match adjacent entities

### Inventory management
- Attempted to insert iron ore without having any in inventory - verify inventory before insertion
- Monitor fuel levels in furnaces and boilers to prevent production stoppages

### Power network
- Continue expanding power pole network as production area grows
- Verify all new assemblers and inserters are within power coverage
- Monitor power production vs consumption as factory expands

### General tips
- Plan complete transport chains before building (source → inserter → belt → inserter → destination)
- Check entity status messages regularly for operational issues
- When troubleshooting, verify each step in the production chain separately
